ComicInfo.Penciller: Herb Trimpe,Jack Keller,Tom Sutton,Jack Keller,Tom Sutton
ComicInfo.Title: The Brute of Copper Canyon!; Call Them... Renegades
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Brute of Copper Canyon!: The Kid's horse is stolen by a gunman backed up by a mighty blacksmith made simpleminded by a blow to the head. When the blacksmith regains his wits he helps the Kid get his horse back.
Call Them... Renegades: The Renegades help Sam Houston destroy a bridge.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
